nodes.bodyText:
So that's a good idea IMHO and this should get in.
Any chance you could get rid of the lambdas? We try to avoid them in runtime code as they have a memory cost.
Thanks!

@gsmet
I changed it. Is it okay to create the Comparator inline like in the current version or do you prefer a static class?
I would make it a static class.
Done. Let me know if there's anything to improve.

I think I would have moved this to fromBoundResourceInvokers but it's a detail.
Can you take care of it, squash everything and put this out of draft?
Okay, I moved it into fromBoundResourceInvokers.
